scripts.setup: cd vue && npm install && cd ../sails && npm install
scripts.vue-build: cd vue && npm run build && cp -a dist/. ../sails/assets
scripts.sails-start-dev: npm run sails-test && npm run start-dev
scripts.test: npm run vue-lint && npm run sails-test
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run vue-lint && npm run vue-build && npm runsails-start-dev
